p: The mean duration of the onset of clinical symptoms and blood collection, Post Onset Day of sample collection (POD) was 5.7 ± 0.8 days (NPR-acute), 6.6±1.8 and 5±0.8 (PR-2-acute and PR-3-acute) and 34.5 ± 2.1 days (NPR-conv). The patients were negative for IgM-anti-HAV, HBsAg / IgM-anti-HBc and anti-HCV antibodies while the controls were negative for all these markers as well as IgM and IgG anti-HEV antibodies. All the patients enrolled under the present study recovered uneventfully.
